questions.text: I went into a room and forgot what I went there for
I took longer than usual to complete a task I used to do faster
I couldn't find the right word or said the wrong one by mistake
I lost the thread of the conversation while talking to someone
I forgot something I was told recently
I had trouble remembering information I already knew
I struggled to make a decision that used to be easy for me
I had difficulty planning my day
I felt like I was thinking slower today
